title: Improv Actor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Deal a Basic Attack to a player. (1 night cooldown)
- (If second attribute is met) Deal a Powerful Attack to a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the day, the host will give you two randomly generated words from https://randomwordgenerator.com/
- To unlock your second ability for the night, you must use these two words at some point within your first 3 messages of the day.

desc:
Post 4592
*"The lasagna role is very malignant toward our faction's objective"*
